   20: 
   21: %%
   22: 
   23: -module(openssl_ECC_SUITE).
   24: 
   25: -include_lib("common_test/include/ct.hrl").
   26: -include_lib("public_key/include/public_key.hrl").
   27: 
   28: %% Common test
   29: -export([all/0,
   30:          groups/0,
   31:          init_per_suite/1,
   32:          init_per_group/2,
   33:          init_per_testcase/2,         
   34:          end_per_suite/1,
   35:          end_per_group/2,
   36:          end_per_testcase/2
   37:         ]).
   38: 
   39: %% Test cases
   40: -export([mix_sign/1]).
   41: 
   42: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   43: %% Common Test interface functions -----------------------------------
   44: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   45: 
   46: all() ->
   47:     case ssl_test_lib:openssl_sane_dtls() of 
   48:         true ->
   49:             [{group, 'tlsv1.2'},
   50:              {group, 'dtlsv1.2'}];   
   51:         false ->
   52:             [{group, 'tlsv1.2'}]
   53:     end.
   54: 
   55: groups() ->
   56:     case ssl_test_lib:openssl_sane_dtls() of 
   57:         true ->
   58:             [{'tlsv1.2', [], [mix_sign]},
   59:              {'dtlsv1.2', [],  [mix_sign]}];
   60:         false ->
   61:             [{'tlsv1.2', [], [mix_sign]}]
   62:     end.
   63: 
   64: init_per_suite(Config0) ->
   65:     case ssl_test_lib:init_per_suite(Config0, openssl) of
   66:         {skip, _} = Skip ->
   67:             Skip;
   68:         Config ->
   69:             case ssl_test_lib:sufficient_crypto_support(cipher_ec) of
   70:                 true ->
   71:                     Config;
   72:                 false ->
   73:                     {skip, "Openssl does not support ECC"}
   74:             end
   75:     end.
   76: 
   77: end_per_suite(Config) ->
   78:     ssl_test_lib:end_per_suite(Config).
   79: 
   80: init_per_group(GroupName, Config) ->
   81:     ssl_test_lib:init_per_group_openssl(GroupName, Config).
   82: 
   83: end_per_group(GroupName, Config) ->
   84:     ssl_test_lib:end_per_group(GroupName, Config).
   85: 
   86: init_per_testcase(skip, Config) ->
   87:     Config;
   88: init_per_testcase(TestCase, Config) ->
   89:     end_per_testcase(TestCase, Config),
   90:     ssl:start(),
   91:     ssl_test_lib:ct_log_supported_protocol_versions(Config),
   92:     ct:timetrap({seconds, 30}),
   93:     Config.
   94: 
   95: end_per_testcase(_TestCase, Config) ->
   96:     application:stop(ssl),
   97:     Config.
   98: 
   99: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  100: %% Test Cases --------------------------------------------------------
  101: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  102: mix_sign(Config) ->
  103:     {COpts0, SOpts0} = ssl_test_lib:make_mix_cert(Config),
  104:     COpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(COpts0, Config), 
  105:     SOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(SOpts0, Config),
  106:     ECDHE_ECDSA =
  107:         ssl:filter_cipher_suites(ssl:cipher_suites(default, 'tlsv1.2'), 
  108:                                  [{key_exchange, fun(ecdhe_ecdsa) -> true; (_) -> false end}]),
  109:     ssl_test_lib:basic_test(COpts, [{ciphers, ECDHE_ECDSA} | SOpts], [{client_type, erlang},
  110:                                                                       {server_type, openssl} | Config]).
  111: 
  112: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  113: %% Internal functions ------------------------------------------------
  114: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
